page.title: 20TYPICAL DAY NICOLA TOLLIDAY
page.content: 6.30 & I'm trying to rouse myself.The paper round has to be finished by 7.30 as we have to have breakfast before school.Normally I have something like sausages or bacon & toast.After break- fast it's oboe or piano practice.At 8 Jo,my sister leaves for school and then Mum,Midge,our spaniel,& I leave.We're lucky because we don't have a set time table.We have a list of things that have to be finished.Some terms we go swimming at Amersham.At noon the bell rings and if it is fine we are allowed to eat outside as a Class 8 privilege in return for doing duties.School ends at 3.30 and we have after school acti- vities :Chess,Computers,Music,Games, Athletics,Gardening.On Saturdays I go to Music Centre then riding.My hobby, apart from riding is swimming and I be- long to the local club,Chalfont Otters and train with them 4 times a week.
